text:
Cover Letter
Respected Sir/Madam, 
              I have done MBA with Finance and Operations as my dual specialization hereby applying for the
post of Finance and Operations. In addition, I offer excellent organizational skills, which have proven to be a
critical asset in driving operations during the current associations. These qualities, combined with my
dedication and tireless  work ethic, should enable me to make a positive impact at your organization.
Enclosed is a copy of my resume for your review. I would welcome an opportunity to discuss your needs
and  objectives  and  the  possibility  of  working  together  to  meet  them.  Thank  you  for  your  time  and
consideration. If you prefer my profile will be interested for your company, do reply with the convenient
time and date when I can possibly visit to your organization. 
              Waiting for your positive reply. 
 
 
    
                                                                                 Yours sincerely,
                                                                                                    Najaf-Ur- RehmanNAJAF-UR REHMAN
H no - 236 Street No- 4
Munga Nagar Karawal Nagar Road
Phone: 91- 99114-32524, 91- 87500-08786
Email: najaf10taqdeef@gmail.com
CAREER OBJECTIVE
To excel in the challenging, dynamic and exciting profession of Management as a thorough professional by
implementing and upgrading my skills and knowledge base with leading corporate, committed and dedicated
people, which will help me to realize my potential and explore myself fully with my ability.
EXPERIENCE
Edelweiss Tokio Life Insurance Co Ltd (November 2013 to Present)
Designation:- Operations Executive
● Primary underwriting at Branch level.
● Scrutiny of All channel Proposal form. (Agency, Broker channel, Housing, Banca,)
● Login of New business and Agency application form.
● Followup the Requirement of all Channels with sales team and client.
● Scanning of all types of New business forms, Policy Servicing requests.
● Coordinating with HO team and getting cases issued.
● Support Operational activity of the Branch.
● Handling Service requests & queries.
● Maintaining different trackers.
● Banking New Business & Renewal Premium collected via Cheque or Cash.
● Maintaining Branch database Business & Recruitment of Development Managers.
● Handling Admin & HR activities at the Branch Level.
● Handling petty cash on daily basis.
● Handling all processes/documentation related to the recruitment of Development Managers.
● Cash Mangement: Maintain all cash records i.e. Collection of premium(Receipting of new
    business Application, Receipting of lapse policy premium,Receipting of agency recruitment
    fee, Receipting of duplicate policy issuing charge.)
● Maintain all types of files which are important as an Audit purpose and future records.
● Claim processing on Branch level.
● Handling the telephonic or walk-in customer on high priority & solving their queries.
● Distribute the reward to Advisor and Development Manger.
● Strong knowledge about Cordys, PS tracker, Ingenium, Life connect.
Achievement’s
Awarded by CEO  and RH for remaining top best BOE of Delhi NCR and 2th PAN India 
ranking for persistency in Rishton ka Renewal Contest during the month of JFM 2015.
Certified ROM and RH for Achiever  BOE of Delhi NCR renewal collection during the month 
of JFM 2016
EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION                                                                                                    
Specialization : Finance and Operations
CourseInstitute/College/School University/Board Year of Passing
MBA (Finance &
Operations)  Amity University    
(Distance Learning)Amity University 2015
B.B.ABhagwati College of 
Management & Technology     C.C S University 2013
KEY SKILLS
Good Analytical skills.
Good Communication Skills.
Self motivated.
Problem analysis and solving skills.
Flexible to work in all conditions.
COMPUTER SKILLS  
Platforms: Windows 98, 2000, Xp, Window-7
Software / Applications:-  Excel, Word, Powerpoint , Microsoft Outlook, Busy
Software.
 PERSONAL VITAE
Father’s Name- Mohd Aneesh-Ur- Rehman
Date of Birth: February 14th , 1988
Marital Status: Single
Languages Known -English,Hindi,Urdu
Personal Traits : - Focused, Enthusiastic, Committed Team player.
Permanent Address - H.No- 236 Street No-4 Munga Nagar Karawal Nagar Delhi
ASSETS     
Good understanding of human behaviour, keen desire to achieve success, self discipline, optimistic attitude,
good planning skills, spirit of team work and cooperation, adaptability and learning ability, believe only in
results, regular and punctual.
DECLARATION
I hereby declare that all the facts given in this resume are correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.
Name:-Najaf-Ur-Rehman                                            Place:-DELHI
